name: Web Browser Powerful

Your music, videos, movies to a Web browser that can play in the background. You provides an easy interface to. You can scroll through pages registered in more convenient shortcuts to quickly page. In this way you can switch between pages. - Ability to find the page. - Number of Main page item. - Home of the regulations. - Automatic adjustment feature.
